name: teammapper
description: Web application to create and work on mindmaps with multiple users.
author: b310 digital gmbh

scripts.build:prod: npm run build:frontend:prod && cp teammapper-frontend/dist -TRv teammapper-backend/client && npm run build:backend:prod
scripts.build:backend:prod: npm --prefix teammapper-backend ci && npm --prefix teammapper-backend run build
scripts.build:frontend:prod: npm --prefix teammapper-frontend ci && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm --prefix teammapper-frontend run build:prod
